remarks: Separate out the last term in a finite product.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 16-Dec-2017.)
statement:
fprodm1.1 $e |- ( ph -> N e. ( ZZ>= ` M ) ) $.
fprodm1.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( M ... N ) ) -> A e. CC ) $.
fprodm1.3 $e |- ( k = N -> A = B ) $.
fprodm1 $p |- ( ph -> prod_ k e. ( M ... N ) A = ( prod_ k e. ( M ... ( N - 1 ) ) A x. B ) ) $.
$d B k $.
$d M k $.
$d N k $.
$d k ph $.
